website_summaries.verdict: The consistency of this MCT oil makes it easy to blend it with beverages and drinks. It goes virtually undetected given it’s tasteless and odorless.
pros: This MCT oil is certified non-GMO
It’s tasteless and odorless, making it easy to mix with coffee or water
Helps those on keto diet to achieve ketosis and helps regulate blood sugar levels
Can also be used on skin
cons: Squirt bottle cap makes it hard to control how much oil comes out at once

customer_reviews.title: Be careful or you might poop your pants.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and I’m a repeat buyer but it should come with a warning label to new consumers. If you’re not used to it and you take too much you will need to stay close to a bathroom. This side effects goes away after a few days but TAKE IT SLOW, trust me on this.
customer_reviews.author: Richard miller

customer_reviews.title: Use caution.
customer_reviews.text: No idea if this really works but if you use to much, it’ll make your farts lumpy. Seriously. You’ve been warned. If you need a system flush this is the stuff. Just be sure to dedicate some time to yourself. Make sure the iPad is charged, candles burning and Lysol spray is topped off.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Messy but Beneficial
customer_reviews.text: This oil gives you a lot of energy BUT! stay close to a bathroom or you'll be sorry! Definitely dont try it out at work. Eventually I got used to it but I regret the mess, the price, and the side effects. I still wanted the benefits so i switched toinstead. So far so good, and the price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: Maria P

customer_reviews.title: I use this twice a day. Once in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a day. Once in the morning in my coffee and again around 2pm in a bottle of water. I have been on the Keto diet for 6 days and already down 7lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very painful. My coworkers thought I was being irresponsible
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this works well or not, because every time I took it I had explosive diarrhea for hours. Very painful. My coworkers thought I was being irresponsible, ditching work, when I was actually dying in the bathroom, giving birth to a new mutant race that would dominate mankind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Best coconut oil on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I mix it and the powdered collagen in my coffee and you can't even taste it! My hair and nails have grown so fast and are so healthy! I have my friends and family purchasing it as well! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: LNTN

customer_reviews.title: Delicious *and* Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so technically there's no flavor to it, but it definitely makes a difference in my household's daily routine. The MCT oil goes a long way in helping curb cravings and hungers, and likewise, I've personally been able to drop 65 lbs. in the course of 3 months with the utilization of MCT and a Ketogenic diet.
customer_reviews.author: Aikavols

customer_reviews.title: This MCT is most certainly for  me! love it
customer_reviews.text: I add 2 TBSP of this to my "Bullet proof coffee" and I am Good! you don't really need the "XTC" or "Brain" booster types at all, this will do you just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ralf

customer_reviews.title: I like that this MCT oil contains lauric acid as most ...
customer_reviews.text: I take MCT oil for over all health. I like that this MCT oil contains lauric acid as most don't. I give it to my mother who has mild Alzheimer's and it has not progressed over these past two years. I've also recommended this brand to several friends and coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Andris

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Keto fat bomb.
customer_reviews.text: For Keto followers, this is the perfect fat bomb to start your day and also if you need to supplement near the end of the day. Flavorless, but packed with calories and fat, it is the perfect blend to keep on track with your health goals. I drop this in my morning coffee along with heavy cream and pure Irish butter and BAM...the perfect fat bomb to start my day. I have definitely noticed improvements to hair, skin and nails also. This is in my daily regimen and I'm so glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Couse

customer_reviews.title: Can't trust your farts anymore
customer_reviews.text: I like to think it works well. Once I started taking it, I definitely noticed a difference with a decrease in mental fogginess from Keto. As for weight-loss, I couldn't say. I eat Keto and workout 3-4x a week, so it may or may not be aiding the weight-loss. But beware, once you start taking this, you will never be able to trust a fart again.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Villacorta

customer_reviews.title: Don't try this at work!
customer_reviews.text: Dear sweet baby Jesus. Just tried this today and I haven't been able to leave the bathroom. I feel like my intestines are melting. On the bright side, I'm sure I've lost 3lbs in pure misery!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Melted Product Container
customer_reviews.text: This was my first order with this product and I was very disappointed. The shipping box was in perfect condition however the container of MCT oil was half melted! The product itself states that it must be kept at room temp and protect from excessive heat. My concern is for the effectiveness and safety of the product if it's kept in a warehouse with temperatures high enough to melt their products.
customer_reviews.author: Ranae Brunson

customer_reviews.title: It is a great source of energy and fat burning for me in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Sports Research MCT oil now for about 5 months in my coffee every day along with salads and for cooking. I use SR MCT oil with my Keto style of eating. I have lost over 60 pounds with the aid of the SR MCT oil.It is a great source of energy and fat burning for me in my everyday life now.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: I like this oil a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this oil a lot, but the packaging (squirt bottle) makes it hard to measure because it squirts out so fast. I have wasted some because it squirts out on to the counter instead of into the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: maria davida

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my coffee every morning along with butter and heavy whipping cream and I am filled up for hours. It’s helped me lose 30 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: shasta714

customer_reviews.title: Digestive issues while using this product
customer_reviews.text: My husband I both were trying this product. We both ended up with "digestive issues". I wasn't sure if this was making us sick so we stopped using it for a few days then tried again and the stomach cramps and diarrhea came back. I wont be ordering this again and don't recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: All Good Things Come to an End
customer_reviews.text: First picture is of the “same” product purchased in 2019, second is of the most recent purchase. It *was* a great product. But... they’ve switched up their sourcing and manufacturing process and, in the mean time, have removed the supplemental magnesium and fatty acid composition. As usual, a company takes a good product and strips it down to the bolts in order to make an extra buck. I won’t be consuming my most recent order and I’ll be looking elsewhere in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Some Grumbly Gut
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for breaking a fast on an OMAD/Keto diet. I consume one tablespoon an hour before eating. I get a tiny bit of grumbly guts about two hours after comsuming but it's no big deal. The benifits of how I use it far out weight a little bubble gut action. I've never experienced extreme cramping or anything more than a few bubble in my gut.
customer_reviews.author: tryingitout

customer_reviews.title: New fav
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great MCT oil, I was using a different brand and kept it in the refrigerator next to my heavy cream and grass fed butter for my bullet proof coffee, this one actually coagulated in the fridge, which leaves me to believe there is more of the natural coconut oil in it, the other one never did that. It also seems to blend better with my nutribullet.
customer_reviews.author: lory

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: We love this!!! We just started the Ketogenic Diet in January and have been adding this to our morning coffee. This was the first brand of MCT Oil we tried, and we are so pleased we are sticking with it. We just ordered our second bottle. It is great quality and has very speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Slocum

customer_reviews.title: ... it helps me keep my blood sugar at a better level. I also have more energy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now and think it helps me keep my blood sugar at a better level. I also have more energy. A very easy to use product.
customer_reviews.author: Ohiostar

customer_reviews.title: I just started using this yesterday, and WOW! ...
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this yesterday, and WOW!!! I immediately felt a difference in my energy levels and ability to focus. I took it by spoon first and then later in coffee with grass-fed butter. Interestingly, I was telling my Indian OB/GYN about it, and he said that his mother used to make him drink tea (no coffee for kids!) with ghee and MCT oil! And that was 60 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Bramblett

customer_reviews.title: Love the drip cap, the taste and the benefits!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm putting it in my smoothies and on my hard boiled eggs and salads, and I freaking love it. I could not eat my hard-boiled eggs without avocado before finding this oil, and now I can. It has a super super fainted taste of coconut, if tried by itself, but it does not change the taste of the things you eat. My daughter (7) thought that my avocado honeydew MCT oil smoothie was made of pistachios and enjoyed some of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Stomach pain...
customer_reviews.text: This gives me a horrible stomach ache that takes almost the whole day to resolve. I've tried taking smaller amounts, but my body cannot tolerate it. I'm bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It has absolutely no taste or smell. Great for cooking fried eggs and other items. I’ve even used it with Bragg’s ACV to make a quick vinaigrette. The only feedback I would give is that it’s hard to control the quantity dispersed based on the type of lid the bottle has. Nevertheless, the package shipped quickly. I will definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Added sooo much to my morning coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This MCT oil has made all the difference to my morning coffee. So much richer tasting, but the oil doesn’t add any other flavor so it’s perfect. I had been on a plateau with my weight loss on Keto, but after using this, I have lost another 8-9 lbs. Not sure if it’s coincidence or MCT oil helped get my ratio numbers right, all I know is that I can’t imagine my morning coffee without it now. Heed the warning on the label and Start out slow with how much you ingest because your digestive system may have to adjust first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is worse than fish oil. It stains anything it comes near and is next to impossible to get off dishes. I tossed it after a few unsatisfactory uses.
customer_reviews.author: M. R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keto lifestyle!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an MCT oil to use in my keto fat bombs and stumbled upon this product. I have had great success using it to add fat to my fat bombs, but I have also been able to mix it with coconut aminos to use as a salad dressing.
customer_reviews.author: SP11

customer_reviews.title: The only think that would be better is if its Organic
customer_reviews.text: I started using the Premium MCT oil in October. I add to to my decaf coffee in the morning. I am not a breakfast person but this along with my Collagen peptides, butter and Coconut oil my coffee gets me through my first few hours. I am focused and energized. The only think that would be better is if its Organic. Now they have Organic. Just ordered and super excited to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Emiley P.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it & swears by it now! Just a small amount in her morning coffee & she's ready to take on the whole world. She claims to feel an all-day energy boost, beyond the standard short lived caffeine buzz. She has also seen great improvements with her fitness goals & regimen since she's started using this. I'll be ordering it for her again, she's very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Wtf?
customer_reviews.text: Would love to have tried it but it was already smashed when I opened the un-smashed box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for "Bulletproof Coffee"
customer_reviews.text: Used to use the NOW brand. Did not have any complaints. Wanted to give this a try and for one, I love that the bottle has a top that is easier to control than just having an open top. So far it's been working with my body just fine - no issues (I'm pretty adapted to MTC oil). I mainly use this in my coffee and add to my salad dressing. I seriously get great mental clarity. If I take it and then go to the gym, always feel like I have energy to spare.
customer_reviews.author: RoccoBakedBeans

customer_reviews.title: The missing link for keto diet
customer_reviews.text: I add to an almond milk protein shake and chocolate gelatin desert. It does not alter the flavor! I have been on the keto diet for some time with no results. As soon as I added this product, the weight started coming off!!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Perry

customer_reviews.title: Sustained energy & (possibly) Weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Since simply adding this to morning cup of coffee and adding to salad dressing I have noticed more energy than I have felt in years. After about 6 months of Whole 30 inspired diet (Paleo) I am down about 20lbs. This oil has been a contributor to loss and has definitely increased energy. It is better than other brand I've used, no strong flavor to influence food/beverage.
customer_reviews.author: brousehouse

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT WORTH BUYING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well.....I never write reviews, but I think this product is worth it!! I can't really put my finger on it, but this product really works! I have been putting this product in my coffee in the morning's because I am trying Keto and so far have lost 10lbs in 10 days!! Exciting! This product did not mess with my stomach at all like some reviews, but I am only taking a tablespoon right now. Thanks for the great product and will buy lots more!!!
customer_reviews.author: sharlyn vest

customer_reviews.title: Creates Fullness until Lunch
customer_reviews.text: I usually put the MCT oil in my coffee in the morning. It’s keeps me full until I eat lunch between 12 and 1. I have also starting putting it in a protein shake for my 10yo. He is a very picky eater who’s does not eat a lot of protein of healthy fat, so this is one way to slip it in. He cannot tell. I’m hoping it will help start the school day off right.
customer_reviews.author: french2s

customer_reviews.title: Do not know if this product leaked or messy boxing.  Concerned about okay to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a different product. Saw this product on deals and decided to try it. Today I tried it. It is too oily in my coffee. I opened the box. Appears it had leaked some. This seal appeared tight but box was greasy. I tried it because I was completely out of what I usually use. Do not think this is going to work for me. Too bad because the price was perfect for my budget and reviews were good.
customer_reviews.author: JanAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Keto diet
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on the Keto diet and uses the Premium MCT Oil in his drinks. He seems to love it. It's a little greasy (obviously, since it's an oil) but even when he mixes a little of it in water, he says you can't taste it. He's been using this Premium MCT Oil for over a year now and has recommended it to all his friends and co-workers. I think pretty much everyone we know on the Keto diet is using this product now and likes it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Steffany

customer_reviews.title: Go MCT oil! Fabulous for multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product! I use it for skin, cooking and smoothies. I've started incorporating it into my coffee, as well, and love the energy it's given me.
customer_reviews.author: melissa culpepper

customer_reviews.title: No bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: I drink 2 tbsp of this MCT oil on the first day. But soon after that I was reading all the warning regarding diaster pans. I was waiting for that and I don't have any reaction! I drink another 2 tbsp the next day and no reaction! And I think I just skip my daily s**t. OK, might be it is just me but so far this oil hasn't give me any bad reaction. No reaction at all. I will keep an eye on the scale and keep alert. Might be I should drink more??
customer_reviews.author: Peachtree

customer_reviews.title: wayy too much lauric acid :(
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying this in the bulk offering. Each cup of coffee or whatever I make with ends up causing a good amount of digestive discomfort and I end up feeling like I need to throw up for a few hours. I changed from this to something with zero lauric acid (brain octane, although I am looking for a cheaper alternative), and I felt great. It's definitely the lauric acid, which means this product is on the cheaper spectrum of MCTs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m not a hippy, but I’m a hippy
customer_reviews.text: I always mix this with my breakfast smoothies or coffee after breakfast. I have a sensitive stomach so if I take it before I’ve had food I get an upset stomach. Take it with my breakfast smoothie or in coffee after I’ve had breakfast and I’m good to go! I can’t taste that it’s in anything I mix it with. It helps give me a little extra kick with energy and focus when I’m at work, and you get a little bit of free lip moisturizer by drinking it. Lol Overall great stuff. No bad burps, ever. Why wouldn’t you want to add something healthy to your diet when it’s easy to mix and easy to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent MCT oil at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent MCT oil at an excellent price. I just received my second bottle and I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Summa Nulla

customer_reviews.title: MCT Oil great with UR Good Morning Smoothie! Zero Processed foods so U feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Sports Research was my first choice when choosing an MCT Oil and I have consistently used this product on a daily basis in by Good Morning Smoothie. MCT oil has many health benefits and I have consistently stayed healthy for the last 24 months. MCT Oil from SR mixes easily in a Good Morning Smoothie. Easily pours from the container and I have never received a damaged container or a surprise in the shipping container, so the shipping process works as well as the product. MCT Oil mixes well with a good morning tea or good night tea including smoothies. Would recommend this to anyone wanting to gain an extra edge in their supplement routine.
customer_reviews.author: gym dude

customer_reviews.title: Great in shakes and smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil and use it every time I make a smoothie or protein shake. The turmeric powder I add needs a fat to be effective, and this oil is a great way to do it. I would use it even if I didn't add turmeric, just for the benefit of the oil. When I think of it, I squirt a little in my hot tea as well.
customer_reviews.author: J.E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Tiny container, won't mix out
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this is NOT a full size container - didn't look closely and assumed it was the same 1lb size as Quest and other MCT oil powders on the market, but actually it's under 9 oz (making it twice as expensive). That's my fault for not looking closely. However the bigger issue is that this won't mix in room temp water without a blender. Ever tried to chug down a chunky liquid for breakfast every morning? Ugh. Going back to my previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: David Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! Label is Mis-leading
customer_reviews.text: Hello, Not a newbie keto / intermittent fasting guy. I have purchased this product 3 times. I recently found information about MCT oils that state that these medium chains are made up of 8 to 10 links of carbon making them the perfect size for absorbing nutrients through our trap-door in the intestines called the Portal Vein. Fats with ten links [C10] or less use this trap-door entrance to slide into our bloodstream and rapidly convert to ketones.2 links long [C12] – too big to slide through the trap-door entrance. This manufacturer does not have any info about how many chains their MCT is. They do not answer their phone and they have not responded to my email. BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: “ITS ALL GOOD! and GOOD FOR YOU!
customer_reviews.text: I love using sports research MCT oil unflavored. I use it in my morning coffee , and I love how it boost my energy levels as well as my mental clarity ! It is also very helpful with my intermittent fasting routine! It helps me to stay on track and diminishes my urge to eat as often or as much ! I also use it on my salads, as well as in my cooking as a cooking oil ! Because it is unflavored I can use it on everything ! :-) SO, “ITS ALL GOOD!!! And GOOD FOR YOU! Thank you sports research for such a healthy NON-GMO product ! I LOVE IT! <3 S. Armijo XOXO :-D
customer_reviews.author: Susan Armijo

customer_reviews.title: mental clarity and energy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this about a week ago and I Love it. I put a table spoon in my morning smoothie and I'm not hungry till around 1pm. I have more energy and more mental clarity. I also wake up with no fog... but that might be the 5 HTP I'm taking at night. Anyway... I love how I'm feeling and I'm going to start to us it in the afternoon too. I just hope I don't have Too much energy!
customer_reviews.author: Just A Guy

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf MCT Oil! just makes me hungry and increases my appetite 😊
customer_reviews.text: great top notch MCT oil!! you can really tell that the oil is clean and pure...simply from its look and taste...very clear and consistent viscosity!! im not sure if it's just a result of mct oil in bullet proof coffee but it seems to make me really hungry after drinking it with ghee and bullet proof lol... aside from that the mct oil is really top notch in quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: junglestrut24

customer_reviews.title: Love this MCT Oil
customer_reviews.text: I use the MCT Oil in my morning tea. I like to extend my morning fast and I feel like the use of the MCT Oil helps with that goal. I like that it is tasteless, but I now see there is a vanilla flavor and I would be interested in trying that with my weekend cup of coffee. I have tried bulletproof and it's too harsh on my tummy, I have had no tummy issues with this MCT Oil product. I like to follow a low carb, lower protein diet. It is hard to get a good percent of my diet as fats and the use of the MCT Oil helps me get an extra dose easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lolli

customer_reviews.title: Amazing feeling!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a while. I would use it on occasion on a weekend when I wasn't fasting with my keto coffee. Recently, since I am taking a break from fasting, I have been using it first thing in the morning in my coffee. My focus and mood in the morning is amazing! I had to buy one for my office so that I can have a dose in the afternoon. I get the fats and focus. I am in love with it. My wife and I use creamy coconut at home and it really adds great flavor to the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. I've lost some weight
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a month.Very good product. I've lost some weight. My overall health is doing wonderfully. Including my cholesterol. Its perfect. I feel capable of doing more thru out the day.Better mental clarity as well. I'm eating well and using certain key supplements. MCT Oil is one of them. Great product
customer_reviews.author: lcmcc

customer_reviews.title: Great! Will keep buying!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite most affordable MCT oil ever. I love how I can get a bang for a buck. This is perfect because it doesn’t cost an arm and a leg and it does the a great job. I like how it has a flip top easy to pore no screw on and off because that gets messy. I put this in my coffee every morning and it makes my coffee even better, and I really like coffee so I didn’t think it could get better. If you are looking for a good MCT oil this is the one to choose.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Blends well in coffee, even using a fork instead of a blender!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with MCT Oil Powder as it blends pretty well in coffee (seems to work best when I put the powder in the mug and then pour the hot coffee gradually over the powder while stirring), even when I a fork instead of a blender, so I get the benefits of MCT without having a layer of unappetizing oil floating on top of my coffee... plus I don't have to wash a blender each morning! Since using this product, I have noticed that my ketosis test strips are more consistently "in the pink" and that is motivating!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Joy Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: SR Purest Supplements I've found
customer_reviews.text: Sports Research provides the best and purest products I have been able to locate. For over a year now I have been including MCT oil 1000 mg softgels to my daily supplements 3 times a day. Along with the CLA 1250 mg I feel my Keto diet is going very well. Seems as though these supplements help curb any cravings I have for sugar or carbs. Thank you SR for making superb products.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Antonio Valverde

customer_reviews.title: This product is excellent! I have been using it in my coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent! I have been using it in my coffee and added to my salad dressing and mayonnaise. It tastes great and is so beneficial to my health and weight loss regimen. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love it in my coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started the Keto diet. I ordered this oil to help get more healthy fats in my diet. I put a tbsp in my coffee every morning along with grass fed butter, collagen and heavy cream. It has really helped me with intermittent fasting and with getting into ketosis. My energy level is through the roof until 11 or 12:00 every day, and this is the only thing I consume in the mornings. There is no taste, just a slight bit of an oily residue. But it isn't as bad if you use a immersion blender to sort of "froth" your coffee. I will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Nosilla02

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend - Losing Weight on Keto Diet
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my coffee every morning to get my Keto diet going. It has been working great and I've been losing weight so I'm going to continue to use this product. Highly Recommend

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I started making "bullet proof" style coffee about a year ago after reading on the benefits of MCT oil and grass fed butter added to your coffee. After researching several brands of MCT oil we decided to try Sports Research brand. WE LOVE it and haven't looked back since! In fact, now I have my Mom hooked on it as well!! Great product for a great price!

customer_reviews.title: Worse MCT Oil
customer_reviews.text: Worse MCT oil. I gained weight instead of losing weight. Also no matter how much I used this MCT oil it would not put me into nutritional ketosis!!! I would check my ketosis several times a day and it would show me traces or low. For weeks I have been thinking what am I doing wrong and than I figured it out today that everything is same the only thing changed was this MCT Oil. Today I threw it away. And ordered Bulletproof Brain Octane I hope that works!
customer_reviews.author: IMM

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my low carb diet.
customer_reviews.text: I mix Sports Research MCT oil into my morning protein drink for a lift out of the morning fog. I feel energized physically and mentally after I drink it. I also find it helps control my appetite. I'm on a low carb diet and this fits in perfectly. I do not like anything in my coffee but I do not taste the MCT oil in my coffee and it gives a smooth taste to the coffee. No added flavor but a wonderful smooth feel I really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mills

customer_reviews.title: I'm so upset - BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the Amazon Choice ribbon I automatically chose this product. I should have read the label more closely - yes it had non GMO, Gluten/Dairy Free, Vegan but I assumed the organic label was there and it is not. I could have purchased VIVA MCT Oil - same - 32 oz for the same price only - ORGANIC! I have to deal with autoimmune issues and buying organic is the only way to avoid the toxins in this environment. I am not going to hop onto any product labeled Amazon Choice that fast anymore. Lesson learned and cannot even return it - only at my cost.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Only MCT Oil I Buy Repetitively
customer_reviews.text: New to the Keto Diet and MCT Oil is a must for healthy fat consumption. I use 1-2 tbsp every morning in my bulletproof coffee and it definitely helps keeping me full and in ketosis. Stomach upset only occurred a few times while I was dialing in how much I should/should not take. So, listen to your body and dial it back if you have too much discomfort. I've tried several brands in the past and this is the only one I continue to buy over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: START SLOW and you'll be happy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a month now and I can tell a DRASTIC change in overall mood and sleep quality! I also lost 11lbs this month on a low carb diet with using this just once a day! START SLOW!!!!!! Start with a teaspoon a day and move up or you will literally produce a messy friend in your pants. I will always use this brand and continue doing what I'm doing. I feel amazing 90% of the time with less fatigue!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Delivery issues
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but when delivered the entire inside of box was coverex with oil!! gross!!!
customer_reviews.author: RR4forever

customer_reviews.title: Medium Chain Triglycerides
customer_reviews.text: Forget about putting it in coffee or losing weight with it.. just make your own salad dressing with it. Lets you taste the rest of your dressing more and doesn't solidify under colder temps like olive oil will. Great for when you turn the fridge all the way up to chill beers and then find your dressing is solidified later on. I've also heard about people using it to make vape juice or THC vape cartridges but I wouldn't trust it..
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Strovanovich

customer_reviews.title: Great, Easy Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 13yr old whom needed to increase calorie intake & we both love this product. No taste, mixes well no dissolve time needed, travels & stores well even an opened pack. I like that we can travel easily with this & it gives u the chance to see if you like it before buying a big container which I did & we don't fully like the way it dissolves & it's not easily transportable. Though I do like the addition of collagen in the bigger powder version of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liquid vs Powder
customer_reviews.text: I had originally tried this brand in powder form and was satisfied, found it to mix fairly well, but decided to try the liquid form. I wish the liquid had the prebiotic like the powder. Other than that, I do prefer using the liquid. A positive improvement they could make is in the cap. It would be nice to have a pour spout with a drain back to prevent waste, dribble and overshot. 🤔 I enjoy my coffee with MCT, butter and heavy cream and since I had already adjusted with the powder, I have no potty bomb issues or abdominal issues. I believe I will be sticking with the liquid form. Please revamp the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Fox

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I've been using the regular premium MCT oil for a while now but I don't have a blender at my work to mix it into my coffee. I love the emulsified stuff so now I can leave it at work and make it easy to mix into my coffee. I'm a huge coffee drinker so this is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: I find this product unnecessary and expensive
customer_reviews.text: I find this product unnecessary and expensive. Just go buy some coconut oil to add to your coffee. I didn't find myseld any more energetic than normal. I gave it three stars because there's nothing actually wrong with the product itself. It is odorless and I can't taste it in my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: AuroraBorealis

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: The best MCT oil on the market! My husband and I have been using the Sports Research Premium MCT oil every day for the past 10 months or more. We consume approximately 1 TBSP. in a cup of coffee blended in the NutriBullet for a healthy alternative to black coffee.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marq

customer_reviews.title: No better than coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: The best MCT oil contains C8, and/ or C10, but no C12. MCT oils that contain C12 are essentially expensive versions of coconut oil. There's plenty of info on the web to support what I'm saying. This is junk. Buy something better which only contains C8 and C10.
customer_reviews.author: kniTp

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this in his coffee daily. We previously tried a different brand and he did not like it, he stated that it had a "funny taste" to it. This MCT Oil does not have a flavor or scent, as promised. We will be sticking with this product consistently going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy L Witte

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I got it because a few people recommended it for constipation but the energy boost this gives me is incredible. I put it in my shakes before workouts in the morning and my coffee in the afternoon. I've had extreme/chronic constipation for over 3 years now. I ordered this along with enzymes, probiotics, and magnesium and started taking them all daily as soon as they arived. It didn't give me the digestive explosion like a lot of reviews mentioned (started with 2tbs per day, no digestive discomfort.), but I've gone to the bathroom once every day for the last week like a normal human should.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaJean

customer_reviews.title: Good price Good product
customer_reviews.text: so I have tried the product for about two weeks now i add it to shakes and smoothies its a great boost for my energy in the morning and it lasts me all day long for me it adds a boost of flavor and texture makes it richer. would buy this again it a good deal on its price compared to if i went to the health food store.
customer_reviews.author: howard hayes

customer_reviews.title: This is the good stuff. Some MCT oil has an off taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the good stuff. Some MCT oil has an off taste. This is tasteless, as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine T Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Combine with Food/Drinks
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product due to its many benefits and I've been slowly trying to transition to a keto diet. I haven't truly experienced a noticeable change in my body, however I enjoy that this is odorless and tasteless. Being tasteless, I add it to many of my drinks. Many people have reviewed that it causes them to have bowel changes, but personally I haven't experienced any of that maybe because I consume this in small doses at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of like a miracle serum. Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing MCT oil and I am a believer! Using only the oil in my coffee (no butter). My skin feels less dry, I am less bloated, able to have a daily BM (sorry if that’s TMI) and my lips are even less chapped.
customer_reviews.author: DCraig

customer_reviews.title: I'm eating half as much as I used to!
customer_reviews.text: I love this MCT oil and have recommended it to all my friends and family. I put a TBL in my coffee every morning. Since adding MCT to my routine I notice I'm not as hungry and have more energy. As a perpetual snacker, the decrease in appetite alone has helped me lose a few lbs. The only complaints I have is sometimes it makes my stomach upset and it takes a little while to get used to the oily consistency in my coffee. Neither are deal breakers. Results are still well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nani A. Saffer

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! No flavor (even thought I love coconut) so it can be added to anything, or you can just do a "shot" of it with NO aftertaste. I drink it in my coffee every AM, and it is delicious! Also, this oil didn't cause me to have any issues with, um, having to be close to the potty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Premium MCT oil mixes perfectly well with any drink but best with coffees
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I pour 2 tablespoons in my coffee every morning and right away I noticed a lot more energy and focus. With no carbs no sugar is best for keto because of the high fat content helps you start faster state of ketosis or the state in which your body uses your internal fat as fuel. I highly recommend it has no flavor and makes my coffee silky and more delicious.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the MCT OIL. I use it both in my coffee and I take it with a 20cc syringe before my lunch. I have Crohn's disease and this oil helps both my tummy issues and also helps with my hair and skin as well. I use multiple products from Sports Research and I will continue to be a loyal customer for as long as they produce great quality products. I highly recommend this brand to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Samy R.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Keto people!
customer_reviews.text: I follow a keto diet and ordered this because I needed to up my fat intake. I followed other reviewers advice and started with a teaspoon. I didn't have any issues, and quickly increased it to a tablespoon and still felt no discomfort. I feel like incorporating this has accelerated my weight loss. I would Definetly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Use it for skin products.  With Lauric acid, not as good for consumption.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product for use in various homemade products such as teeth cleaner (just mix with baking soda until mixture is thick enough to stay on toothbrush) and facial wipes (plenty of DIY directions online). I don't use it for consumption because I only want caprylic and capric acid with no lauric acid to get the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: Best Cholesteral dropper!
customer_reviews.text: No taste, add it to my coffee everyday for a month an my bad cholesteral was down 20 pts, triglicerides in half, my good cholesteral up 20. I AM AMAZED.. Doing it now for two more months and see if I can be normal again and no pills.
customer_reviews.author: D Mastrom

customer_reviews.title: Natural, works well!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I've definitely noticed a difference in how I feel. I was born with a knot in my colon so this helps me stay regular. I squirt a little bit in my coffee every morning only about a tsp because I'm 5'3" approx 150lbs. It took some getting used to the oily film on my lips when drinking my coffee but I keep a napkin handy. Be careful too much at one time will make you sick and cause painful cramping.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea578

customer_reviews.title: Melts into the coffee
customer_reviews.text: Add this to my morning coffee and so glad to have found it! This is easy to use and doesn't leave the oily film that the MCT liquid creates. That's gross to drink and leaves your whole mouth not good first thing in the morning. I have not had any clumping, I add hot coffee to the poser in my cup and stir . No taste except coffee. Thanks, I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: SoMdAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use during keto, and it does what I expected it to. As others have noted, be sure to ease into the suggested serving size, or you might experience some bowel discomfort and frequent bathroom trips. I like the bottle-it is big, but it doesn't leak, which I've found to be an issue with many of the other brands/bottle styles I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Roling

customer_reviews.title: Product Worked as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I could tell a difference the first time I used the product. I had more energy to get through my day. I lost 4 pounds during my first week, without any exercise. I was on vacation last week, but plan to start full program with diet and exercise next week. I look forward to experiencing the full benefits of the product.
customer_reviews.author: SGTnNC

customer_reviews.title: Slippery bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product as my hair and nails have improved after only 4 weeks! However I do not like the packaging. No matter if you use the spout or remove and pour the oil drips. The drips make the bottle oily and since the bottle is rather slick it is difficult to handle. It would be better to have a pump as some others companies include. Packing is not for anyone with any dexterity issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amarillo Girl

customer_reviews.title: I have noticed that overall I'm feeling much better, have more energy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this in the mornings. I put a tablespoon in my coffee along with a tablespoon of unsalted grass-fed butter. I have noticed that overall I'm feeling much better, have more energy, and have more mental clarity. It is truly odorless and tasteless. Use a Blender like a ninja bullet because it is an oil, but works great with blender!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of  2

customer_reviews.title: It's really good stuff - I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it now for about a year. I have to admit that the thought of it was not appealing but that all changed once I actually tried it. I use it instead of salad dressing along with pepper and now I use it exclusively for salads. I always add 4 tbsp in my protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Holms

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulletproof coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this MCT oil for a few months. Mainly use it for my bulletproof coffee. I've been using MCT oil for quite some time so I have no problem putting 2 tablespoons in my coffee. I go to the bathroom 1x after or sometime in between my morning coffee but nothing crazy, as I've read other comments. Once your body gets used to it and you're eating a healthier diet the less need you'll have to be near a toilet when consuming this product 😉
customer_reviews.author: K.E.M.

customer_reviews.title: bulletproof coffee approved!
customer_reviews.text: I always use coconut oil in my bulletproof/fatty coffee... I never wanted to even try MCT oil, but when I saw the flash sale, I decided to go for it. I like that it is liquid at all temps which means I don't have to worry about it solidifying if my coffee cools off. My first cup of coffee after receiving Premium MCT Oil was perfectly smooth and silky. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Infuses well and doesnt hurt the stomach
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an oil to infuse with THC. I take about 8000mg worth of this oil a day, with food. It binds really well and Ive had no stomach issues. No smell, no weird taste, good to go. For my longer, boring winter rides on the trainer, the 4-5hrs fly by a lot easier with THC edibles, and this oil works great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Really helps
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time if used this product I was using something else but when I read the ingredients I switched. I once take this first thing in the morning to jumpstart my day. I find that it truly helps me focus better and gives me a bit more energy in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Source76

customer_reviews.title: This review is gmo and vegan free
customer_reviews.text: It is coconut oil. No need to remind me it is vegan. It’s made from coconut. GMO free, great news. You don’t get gmo coconuts. Save your money paying for bs certifications and make it sustainable to the local communities or environment
customer_reviews.author: 14th_Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Def gives me energy in the AM
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Learned through a health seminar that you can buy organic coconut oil for 1/3 of the price and is the same that thing!!! When I watch what I eat I do start to get leaner while drinking MCT every morning with my coffee. It's not a miracle potion but if joined with a healthy lifestyle you will like the subtle affects. (feeling full, energy, etv).
customer_reviews.author: Polly026

product_meta.title: Premium MCT Oil derived only from Non-GMO Coconuts
feature_bullets: BENEFITS: Medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs) are a type of fat that may help your body achieve Ketosis - the process which your body burns fat for energy.*
COCONUT OIL: 100% Coconut Sourced with NO Palm Oil. Contains the full spectrum of MCTs including Lauric Acid.*
REAL CERTIFICATIONS: Our MCT Oil is Non-GMO project Verified and 3rd party certified Keto, Paleo and Vegan Friendly
USES: MCT Oil is odorless, tasteless and can be substituted with traditional oils. Add to protein shakes,coffee, or any other types of beverages.
90 DAY SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you don't see results within 90 days, simply return your product for a refund.+
